text:
http://jakarta.apache.org/jmeter/usermanual/build-db-test-plan.html
In this page, the sampler is the old style (where a separate password and
username can be entered), not the 2.x JDBC sampler
This is sort of important, because one might be lead to think that in the same
test plan it's possible to connect to different databases (or have different
usernames), see below

There's also a link to a 
"JDBC Database Login Defaults" that I believe is not in the product anymore.

Also in the JDBC connection configuration
http://jakarta.apache.org/jmeter/usermanual/component_reference.html#JDBC_Connection_Configuration
it might be useful to specify that only 1 per test plan can be used.
creator: irancati@sharpmind.de
